name: Eagle Genomics
overview:
Eagle Genomics is a bioinformatics services and software company specialising in the provision of open-source solutions. Since its foundation in 2008 the company has rapidly become one of the leading providers of genomic data management and integration using open-source bioinformatics.

Eagle’s team of high calibre developers and researchers is drawn from both industry and academia with an extensive experience in bioinformatics and software development.

Based in the heart of Europe’s largest biotech cluster in Cambridge, UK, Eagle has daily contact with some of the most well-respected and leading researchers in the field, providing a unique insight into the current state of play and future directions.

Eagle Genomics is extremely flexible in the ways it can work with customers. From big pharma to university research groups, CROs to small biotech start-ups, Eagle can provide everything needed to make the most of investment in open-source bioinformatics.
